title: AFC, NFC title previews with Brady Quinn (Football 1/17)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn to break down the latest happenings around the NFL, including Adam Gase and the curious case of the floating tacos (2:00), whether coaches should have to wear ties at press conferences (8:00), Antonio Brown tweeting through it and how that situation should/will end up unfolding (11:15), Kyler Murray's situation (19:30), who Brady thinks will win the AFC Championship between the Chiefs and Patriots (25:15), the coldest game of Brady's career (34:15) and how he sees the NFC Championship Game between the Saints and Rams shaking out (38:20).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
